## bind_sports_field_data

## Description
 Bind sports field data 


## Usage
```r
 
bind_sports_field_data( 
  ., 
  data = NULL, 
  information = NULL, 
  team = NULL, 
  category = NULL, 
  size = NULL, 
  position_x = NULL, 
  position_y = NULL, 
  filter = NULL, 
  image = NULL, 
  add_to_popup_panel = NULL 
) 
```

## Arguments
|Arguments|Description|
|---|---|
| . | The prior Flourish object. No need to specify name if piping graph as the graph will take the first argument (i.e. the prior existing graph). |
| data | A data frame |
| information | I.e. the player's name |
| team | Player's team. Used to set fill color for each dot |
| category | Player's category. Used to set stroke color for each dot. |
| size | Use this column to adjust the size of the circle. |
| position_x | Use this to move the player to a specific position on the pitch. |
| position_y | Use this to move the player to a specific position on the pitch. |
| filter | Setting a column here will add a control to the visualization to filter the players. You could use this for example on a time or country column. |
| image | Point to column with image URLs. |
| add_to_popup_panel | Add additional information to popups or panels. |
